description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(858).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,1406,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[858], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(29 + 88 x + 205 x^2 + 703 x^3 + 205 x^4 - 88 x^5 + 29 x^6 - x^7)/(1 - 1406 x^4 + x^8), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 30 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
